author: Eric Battles
text: Does anyone have a list of law enforcement, first responder and/or homeland security professional consultants (nation-wide)? In an effort to boost the responses to our RFP for a full scale active shooter exercise, in addition to the traditional RFP bid promotion processes, I was trying to find a professional association that would have a list of these types of firms. Does anyone know of any? Attached is the RFP in case you want to see exactly what type of a project it is.
title: Consultant for Full-Scale Law Enforcement Exercise
